replies.body: Sooo just updated to patch 4.6 and dropped $55 on the game to get some new skins and the new champ, exc. exc. Go to play the new game mode and right after the champ select countdown the game just vanishes. Says it's still running but when I try and click it just goes to the "Game still in progress" screen and never actually opens into loading screen. Can't reconnect no matter how many times i click it, tried restarting and currently doing a repair right now to try and fix this. Anyone else get this?
so after awhile (a long while) u will get back in. my game finaly started after a good 10-15 min
i dont even have the option to rejoin

***UPDATE***:

We made sure to update the [Server Status page](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na) with the latest information!

Hey guys,

We have seen a number of reports from everyone saying that they are stuck in Champion Selection.  We are reaching out to our Network Teams right now to see if we can get some further information!

We'll update as soon as we hear something!
so, i rellogged back in. no reconnect button. the game cannot be found in history, so im good right?
of course im in my series....
i dont think it'll affect your series

i left too. now there is a queue time to log in

gg rito
same as me, I finally left tho
my team is all just chilling in the lobby. lelololol

Same here

Alt+F4'd after waiting about 5 minues and now the reconnect button won'twork.

Think PvP net crashed
Yeah three of us were stuck at champ select and now we can't log back in. Sigh. Riot, please..
same with the asension game im in right now
